edu.mmatfb.cpre288.controller

Class ControllerReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.mmatfb.cpre288.controller.ControllerReader

  • public class ControllerReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Class contains a process that runs a .bat file which runs a .sh file on cygwin and writes the output to a file. which is read by readLast();
    Author:
    rtoepfer

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  ControllerReader.ControllerLine
      private class mirrors the structure of the controller output for internal use.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void readLast()
      Reads the last line written by the controller program
      void respondToReading()
      performs an action based on the last result of readLastLine, such as sending a Go command to the bot
      private void scanLine(java.lang.String line)
      uses a scanner to parse the last line read into the controller into a ControllerLineObject
      void stop()
      destroys the controller reading process
